# Installation

## How to install Python

```
        ## Download and unarchieve
        wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.6.0/Python-3.6.0.tgz
        tar -zxvf Python-3.6.0.tgz
        
        ## installation
        ./configure --prefix=$HOME/local/Python-3.6.0 --enable-optimization
        ./make
        ./make install
        

```
